subproject.description: promoting the outreach of financial services that selected credit unions in Belize can offer to low income households as well as small and micro-business enterprises in rural and other poverty stricken areas
subproject.title: Pro-Poor Capacities for Rural

subproject.description: The project’s goal is to support the decentralization process of the Government of Belize by strengthening local institutional capacities. A contribution to the achievement of this goal will be made by strengthening Village Councils, District Association and the National Association of Village Councils (hereinafter “NAVCO”) so as to influence policy makers in fostering national development, in particular poverty alleviation in rural areas. The project’s  activities are geared toward the up-scaling of local organizational and governance capacities in NAVCO
subproject.title: Pro-Poor Capacities for Local

title: Pro-Poor Capacities for Rural Gov and RFS
